articles.title: Foundation anniversary of URT marked
articles.content:
Foundation anniversary of URT marked
   Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting celebrating the 35th anniversary of the foundation of the United Republic of Tanzania was sponsored here by the  Korea-Tanzania Friendship  Association on April 26.   Present there were Sung Sang Sop, chairman of the central committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and chairman of the friendship association, members of the association and citizens.
   A speech was made and a congratulatory message to the Tanzanian President was adopted at the meeting.

Honorary doctorate awarded to Japanese professor
articles.content:
Honorary doctorate awarded to Japanese professor
   Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The Honorary Doctorate of Agriculture of the DPRK was awarded to Prof. Teruo Higa of Ryukyu University of Japan  at a ceremony held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.   This conferment is in recognition of his great contribution to developing microbiological fertilizers through scientific researches and distributing them to different countries.  Present there were vice-premier Jo Chang Dok, president Ri Kwang Ho of the Academy of Sciences and other  officials concerned.

Compound microbiological technological institute established
articles.content:
Compound microbiological technological institute established
    Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The compound microbiological technological institute has been established in Korea.  It has up-to-date equipment, devices and apparatuses needed for the production of various kinds of compound microbiological bacteria and scientific researches.  It will function as a strong foundation for further developing the country's compound microbiological industry.   Its establishment is associated with the patriotic devotion of Koreans in Japan and the efforts of Japanese agro-scientists.   The institute was commissioned on the spot on Monday.

Greetings to Malaysian King
articles.content:
Greetings to Malaysian King
   Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- President Kim Yong Nam of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK sent a message of greetings to Sultan Salahuddin Abdul Aziz Shah al-Haji al-Marhum Sultan Hisamuddin on the occasion of his accession to the throne of Malaysian King.   The message wished greater success to the King and the Malaysian people in the work to build a rich and prosperous developed country as well as good health and happiness to him.
